MaintenanceWorkRule.name: MaintenanceWorkRule
MaintenanceWorkRule.description: Represents the recurrence pattern for a maintenance record.

DoesFloatingWorkOrder.description: Indicates that the maintenance plan uses the floating work order adjustment. The default is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the line item was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the line item was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of this maintenance work rule.

NextSuggestedMaintenanceDate.description: The next date on which this rule will generate maintenance items.

OwnerId.description: The assigned owner of the maintenance work rule.

ParentMaintenancePlanId.description: The maintenance plan associated with the maintenance work rule.

ParentMaintenanceRecordId.description: The maintenance record this work rule applies to.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: ID of the recordset filter criteria associated with this maintenance work rule. Available in API version 52.0 and later.

RecurrencePattern.description: The RRULE that defines the pattern of recurrence for this work order rule.

SortOrder.description: The sort order that applies to this work order rule.

Title.description: The title of this work order rule.

Type.description: The type of maintenance work rule. Available values are: Criteria-based Calendar-based (default) Available in API version 52.0 and later.

WorkTypeId.description: The ID of the work type that this work order rule generates.
